mobile-frontend-copyright: Nsɛm a wɔwɔ ha yi bo nndu $1 gye dɛ wɔkyerɛ dɛ bo no yɛ fofor
mobile-frontend-edit-login-action:
Mboa ma yentu npɔn {{SITENAME}}.
Kɔ mu na hyɛase yɛ nsiesie.
mobile-frontend-edit-signup-action:
Boa ma yentu mpɔn {{SITENAME}}.
Fa wo dzin hyɛ mu na hyɛase dzi dzuma
mobile-frontend-editor-anon: Dzi dwuma ber a nnkyerɛ wo dzin na wo kukuam ahyensudzi
mobile-frontend-editor-blocked-drawer-ac: Fa me kɔ kratafa fofor do
mobile-frontend-editor-blocked-drawer-ti: Nnkotum edzi dwuma wɔ dɛm kratafa yi do osiandɛ yesiw wohokwan.
Yesiw wo IP addrɛsse hokwan dɛ edze bɛyɛ nsiesie {{SITENAME}}.
Yesiw wo IP addrɛsse hokwan dɛ ibɛyɛ nsiesie wɔ dɛm kratafa yi do
mobile-frontend-editor-blocked-drawer-bo: Yɛ dɛ erebɛ nsiesie  wɔ kratafa fofor do
Sɛ ɛwɔ account a bɔ wodzin na bue.
Kɔ wu account nu mu. anaadɛ wobɛtumi ayɛ kratafa fofro ho dzuma.
Bɔ mmɔdzin dɛ ɛbɛkɔ mu anaadɛ ɛbɛbue account fofro.
Bɔ mbɔdzen dɛ bɔkɔ mu anaa ibobue account anaa ibɛyɛ nsiesie wɔ krataafa fofor.
mobile-frontend-editor-captcha-try-again: Abɔ koodu a ɔnnyɛ, san bɔ bio.
mobile-frontend-editor-disabled: Yɛabɔ kratafa yi ho ban mbrɛ ɔbɔyɛ a nyimpa bi nnsɛe no. [$1 View source]
mobile-frontend-editor-disabled-anon: Ɔwɔ dɛ ekɔ mu ansaana eetum aayɛ nsesa wɔ dɛm kratafa yi do.
mobile-frontend-editor-error-conflict: Mfomdo, obi fofor asesa dɛm krataafa yi.
mobile-frontend-editor-error-preview: Mfomdo, a w'ani nndado siiɛ berɛ a ebue kane de no. Mepa wo kyew tom na sane bue bio.
mobile-frontend-editor-licensing: Egye to mu dɛ ibegyaa wo mboae no ahyɛ $1 {{PLURAL:$2|tumdze krataa|tumdze nkrataa}}ase ber a edze nsesa roto gua no.
mobile-frontend-terms-text: Nhyehyɛɛ a ɔfa no dwumadzi ho
